name: Three Bell Capital
overview:
Three Bell Capital is a world class comprehensive wealth management firm that focuses on Private Wealth Management, Corporate Retirement Plans, and Private Placement Transactions.

Three Bell Capital is comprised of a team of experienced industry professionals dedicated to providing a superior suite of financial services to a limited number of clients for whom we can have tremendous impact.

Whether you are a private wealth management client, a business interested in establishing or transitioning a retirement plan, a private company employee seeking liquidity, or an institution looking to purchase private company securities, the Three Bell Capital team is your professional financial resource.
